title: SEO Attributes Configuration

validation.errorMessage: Meta description should be between 120-160 characters
Page should have exactly 1 H1 tag

scraping.computation: h1Count + h2Count + h3Count + h4Count + h5Count + h6Count

validation.errorMessage: Content should have at least 300 words
